Introduction
This topic contains information on claims for reimbursement of burial expenses paid by a State or agency or political subdivision, including
what VBA does not reimburse for burial expenses
, and
exceptions for State plot or interment allowance
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C  - Burial Authorization Payment Issues
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
